sections.name: *** Settings ***
sections.doc:
1) Importing test libraries, resource files and variable files. 
 2) Defining metadata for test suites and test cases.

sections.name: *** Variables ***
sections.doc: Defining variables that can be used elsewhere in the test data.

sections.name: *** Tasks ***
sections.doc: Creating tasks using available keywords. Single file can only contain either test cases or tasks.

sections.doc: Creating test cases from available keywords.

sections.name: *** Keywords ***
